title: Counselor Interview
Interview Descriptions: Not bad, easy questions, very little confusion on the interviewing process. Fast response time when responding to emails. A good description of the meeting place. Very little stress in interviews, nice people, and very realistic.
Interview Questions: Q. what have you learned from previous jobs

title: Substitute Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village
Interview Descriptions: Little bit frustrating. The entire process took about 1 month from applying to actually working.  Needed clearances, urine test and group interview until you are actually hired. They do provide training before actually teaching.
Interview Questions: Q: What king of experience do you have as a teacher?

title: MST Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village (Greensburg, PA) in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions: I applied online, recieved a phone call about 4 days later, brief phone interview, scheduled appointment for three days later. Interviewed with direct supervisor and Project Director. After interview I had a phone interview with the Clinical Director. I was called a few days later and offered the position. All aspects of the interview process was smooth and seamless. The interviewers were very positive and complimentary to my skill-set. Intervew was strength based and friendly.
Interview Questions: What was my understanding of evidence based models of therapy.  My feelings about delivering services in families homes. My confidence to ameliorate stressful situations.

title: School Based Mental Health Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth and professional. I initally received a phone call and scheduled an interview two weeks later. The entire interview lasted approximately 40 minutes. I was interviewed by two people who took turns asking questions and speaking with me. I got a chance to ask my own questions towards the end of the interview.
Interview Questions:
Describe a challening situation involving a student that you had to deal with. 

Where do you see yourself professionally in 5 years?

Why did you apply for this position?

title: Records Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: I received a phone call from a very kind (but very chatty) gentleman in HR to schedule an interview a few weeks after I had faxed in my resume. I was emailed the wrong address for the interview which was pretty irritating considering the location was a complex of buildings which all seemed to be locked. Once I found the correct building I interviewed with 2 people. They seemed nice and didn't ask any ridiculous questions. The interview itself was quick and easy but I never received a call back.
Interview Questions: What was your biggest accomplishment in your current position?

title: Youth Care Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village (Hollidaysburg, PA) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: I submitted my resume, was called a day later, and an interview was set up. I interviewed with two supervisors, and they called me a couple of days later to offer me the job.
Interview Questions: How are you with working with a diverse community of kids?

title: MST Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village (Pittsburgh, PA) in Mar 2014
Interview Descriptions: Interview with director and direct supervisor.  2nd interview by phone with MST Consultant. Interview lasted about 1 hour, in person and 1/2 by phone.  Was casual and friendly.
Interview Questions: Role played various scenarios that can happen during therapy session

title: Counselor of Young Adults Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village (Latrobe, PA) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: I initiatiated the interview as a request to be hired! I had a idea of the questions to be asked and had documentation to substantuate my answers! I had one interview! I tried to be as frank and as open as posible in answering the questions asked! The perception I had as of the people in the office were that they were professionals but they had a strict budget to comply with!
Interview Questions: I was asked to be flexable as to my request for employment! I applied for a position as counselor! The job describtion was for someone to watch the children in a dormitory setting 11:00pm to 7:00am! I felt decieved by the whole application/interview process!

title: Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village (Latrobe, PA) in Jun 2011
Interview Questions: How would you deal with a crisis?

title: Clinical Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Adelphoi Village in Jan 2007
Interview Descriptions: Ient resume by mail and received a call for interview within two weeks. Had one face-to-face interview and was offered the position within one week. Salary was presented as non-negotiable. The interviewer appeared to be looking for a positive attitude and a willingness to follow rules.
Interview Questions: Why are you looking to leave your current job?
